TextView.android:text: This is the most advanced course for an S and C coach with a period of 1 year. It will focus on all the necessary skills and theory needed for coaching and training. It will also help you through mock tests and discussion classes. You will be certified at the end of the course and you will be able to design programs to elite athletes and train them as they want. You will be able to deal with any kind of problems faced as an S and C Coach. After completing this course you will be able to clear all the necessary exams and certification courses. This is all max course which is needed for any S and C coach.
Strength and Conditioning program for novice and state level athlete
Adaptation to Aerobic and anaerobic training
Age and Sex-Related Differences in Optimal Peak Power
Psychology of preparing an athlete with peak performance
